title: Death toll triples to more than 300 in recent China flooding
content:
1. Death toll triples to more than 300 in recent China flooding  Yahoo News
  2. Death Toll in China Floods Surges Past 300  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Death toll in central China floods rises to 302, dozens still missing • FRANCE 24 English  FRANCE 24 English
  4. Public needs an answer for Zhengzhou floods high death toll: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. China Orders Henan Flood Probe After Death Toll Surges  Bloomberg

localize.title: 中国で発生した洪水による死者数が3倍の300人以上に増加
在最近的中国洪灾中，死亡人数增加了两倍，超过300人
在最近的中國洪災中，死亡人數增加了兩倍，超過300人
